description: Erection of new part five/ part six-storey building fronting Battersea Park Road, and formation of part two/part three-storey buildings with retained façades to Warriner House and Alexandra House, to provide 2,636 sq.m. of offices (B1); 187 sq.m. retail/office (A1 or A2); crèche and 72 flats, with basement parking for 93 vehicles.
